reviews.text: This restaurant is simply awesome. Been here many times, impressed by the quality of food, friendly owner Renfred and staff. A great place to relax in peaceful ambience. We had set lunch Bara Chirashidon and Salmon Teriyaki Don. We also ordered the grilled sardines and grilled salmon belly...all so yummy. Had tried most of the food there...all good.

Highly recommend this place for anyone looking for quality Japanese food with a cozy and welcoming atmosphere!

The sashimi was incredibly fresh. The dandan tofu sauce is homemade and unique, perfect for appetiser. For dessert, you must order the Earl Grey cheesecake!

The staff were also super friendly, attentive, and made us feel right at home.

Went to this restaurant to celebrate my mom’s birthday and food was delicious and service was good! owner of the restaurant was really friendly and service staff was attentive although a little short staffed at the moment. I would recommend the tonkatsu set salmon set and unagi don! Truffle fries to share is highly recommended too!!

Sake range is quite unique and the tastes are good. Price of the sake is not too expensive also!

Food is good and place have a nice atmosphere, and the staff and owner very is friendly - this made the entire dinning experience good.

Will come back again!

Monzen Izakaya is an ordinary neighbourhood Japanese restaurant offering a decent range of dishes. The decor is quite basic, and service is a tad slow. We find it a bit pricey for what it offers (overall experience). While the food is generally acceptable, it doesn’t particularly stand out.”
